other_tests.findings: A small fragment of fibromuscular tissue with a central acellular eosinophilic zone indicating necrosis, surrounded by a modest, predominantly chronic granulomatous inflammatory infiltrate.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The biopsy findings suggest granulomatosis with polyangiitis, which has a chronic recurrent course and indicates persistence of inflammation despite treatment.

other_tests.findings: Pallor of the right optic disk, exotropia, and a right inferior central defect on visual-field testing.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Symptomatology improved with treatment initially, but recurred suggesting exacerbation of the underlying condition.
